news.title: Novo Nordisk shares plunge 9% after Alzheimer's drug trial fails to hit key target
news.summary: Novo Nordisk shares plunged after the Danish drug pharmaceutical company said a highly-anticipated trial for Alzheimer's disease failed to meet its main goal.

news.title: Ukraine desperate to keep Trump on its side in peace talks, while saving its sovereignty
news.summary: Talks between U.S. and Ukrainian officials were held this weekend. It emerged that Russia and the White House had secretly devised a peace plan.

news.title: How Alibaba overcame Beijing's crackdown to become an AI giant
news.summary: The Alibaba empire was once under intense scrutiny from Beijing and competition from rivals. Now a big AI bet is helping it stage a revival. The company is now one of the world's biggest online retailers.

news.title: Trump administration unresponsive after containership fire, Port of Los Angeles chief says
news.summary: The head of the Port of Los Angeles has repeatedly asked the Trump administration for help. As a containership continues to burn, the head has asked for help from the White House.

news.title: Bessent believes there won't be a recession in 2026 but says some sectors are challenged
news.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the U.S. was not at risk of entering a recession in 2026. He said Americans would soon benefit from Trump's policies.

news.title: Why the real poverty line is $140,000, this strategist argues
news.summary: A 1963-era calculation no longer makes sense, one strategist says. "It's time to change the way we look at the world," he says.

news.title: Rebuffed for the second time, BHP walks away from Anglo American, leaving the path clear for $60 billion merger
news.summary: BHP made one last-gasp attempt to seduce Anglo but it looks like they have now accepted defeat. BHP tried to make a last-ditch attempt to win back control of the company.

news.title: Is it finally ‘game over’ for AI and Big Tech stocks?
news.summary: potential Fed rate cut in December could reignite a 'risk-on' flame. Why the market looks to be in ‘early 1999’

news.title: Novo Nordisk’s oral GLP-1 drug didn’t work on Alzheimer’s as hoped, and the stock tumbles
news.summary: Novo Nordisk's oral GLP-1 drug failed to show much benefit over a placebo against Alzheimer's. Novo Nordisk’s stock tumbles.

news.title: Carvana survived a debt crunch. Can it survive Amazon?
news.summary: Carvana's rebound is facing its biggest test yet: Amazon. Carvana’s stunning rebound is now facing its most difficult test yet.
